DOC.brief_summary: Purpose : To determine whether use reading glass block near work mediate increase incidence myopia healthy school child . Methods : SMART enrol 115 emmetropic child ( age 7-9 year ) . The child recruit Principality Liechtenstein . They randomly assign either control group ( n=52 ) receive read glass lens power +2.0 dioptre ( n=63 ) . The primary outcome measure progression towards myopia determine autorefraction cycloplegia . The secondary outcome measure change biometry measurement corneal curvature , axial length , anterior chamber depth , crystalline lens thickness , vitreous chamber depth use partial coherence interferometry .
